item.title: Karnataka: 13 Killed, 19 Injured In Road Accidents In Yellapura, Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[At least 13 people died and 19 others were injured in two separate road accidents in Karnataka on Wednesday, police said. In the first incident, a truck carrying fruit vendors plunged into a 50-metre-deep valley on the Savanur-Hubballi Road in Yellapura, killing nine individuals and injuring nine others. The accident occurred around 5:30 am in a forested section of the road when the driver, attempting to give way to an overtaking vehicle, swerved too far left.
The truck, lacking barrier walls o...]]>

item.title: Four killed on the spot in road accident near Raichur’s Sindhanur
item.description:
<![CDATA[As many as four men, including three students from Samskrita Pathashala of Mantralayam in Andhra Pradesh, were killed on the spot after the cruiser vehicle they were travelling in overturned near Sindhanur city in Raichur district late night on January 21, 2025.
The victims have been identified as Hayavadana (20), Sujayendra (22), Abhilash (20), and driver Shiva (25).
A total of 14 people were travelling from Mantralayam to Anegundi in Koppal district to participate in a religious programme. T...]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: Three students among four killed in road accident in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[News Cities Bangalore Three students among four killed in road accident in Raichur
Three students among four killed in road accident in Raichur
The Sindhanur police visited the spot, shifted the bodies to the mortuary and injured to the hospital.
Four people, including three students, were killed and ten others were injured when their vehicle overturned in Sindhanur district.
At least four persons including three students were killed and ten others injured when the vehicle they were travelli...]]>

item.title: BJP misusing police to derail AAP campaign, intimidate voters: Arvind Kejriwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[NEW DELHI: AAP national convenor and former Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal alleged Wednesday the BJP is using the city police to disrupt his party's poll campaign and intimidate voters ahead of the February 5 assembly elections.
"All the Delhi Police is with the BJP. No one is there for the security and safety of the people. One of the SHOs told me they get direct instructions from the Ministry of Home Affairs to disrupt our rallies," Kejriwal told a press conference, also addressed by Ch...]]>

item.title: Fourteen killed, scores injured in two separate accidents in Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[Yellapura/Raichur (Karnataka) | As many as fourteen people were killed and scores sustained injuries in two separate road accidents occurred in Uttara Kannada and Raichur districts on Friday.
Condoling the tragic incident, Chief Minister Siddaramaiah said the families would be paid compensation.
“It's heartbreaking to hear the news that 14 people died in two separate accidents in Yellapur in Uttara Kannada district and Sindhanur in Raichur district. I pray for the souls of the deceased to rest...]]>

item.title: 11 die in Uttara Kannada crash, 4 in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Bengaluru, Jan 22 (UNI) Eleven people lost their lives in a tragic accident on Wednesday morning in the Arebile area of Uttara Kannada district.
The victims, primarily vegetable vendors enroute to Kumta market, were travelling in a truck that veered off course and plunged into a deep valley.
Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah extended his condolences to the bereaved families, assuring them of compensation. "The state government will ensure support to the affected families during this di...]]>
item.author: Uniindia News Service

item.title: Raichur: Vehicle traveling to Koppal topples as driver loses control after tyre burst
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Vehicle traveling to Koppal topples as driver loses control after tyre burst four dead, ten injured
Vartha Bharati | 22-01-2025 | 14:11:00 IST
Raichur: Four people, including three students, were killed when a tyre of the Cruiser vehicle they were traveling in burst, resulting in the vehicle rolling sideways on the stretch near Arginamara Camp in Sindhanur taluk on Tuesday night.
The deceased have been identified as Hayavadana (18), Sujayedra (22) and Abhilash (20), who were stud...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi

item.title: Karnataka: Ten killed, 5 injured as vehicle overturns in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Four people died and 10 others were injured after a vehicle overturned overturned at Sindhanur in Karnataka's Raichur district. Read further on Dynamite News:
Raichur (Karnataka): Ten people died and 15 others were injured after a vehicle overturned at Sindhanur in Karnataka's Raichur district on Wednesday morning, said the police.
Information awaited
A case was filed at Sindhanur Traffic Police Station. More information is awaited.

item.title: 3 students among four killed in road accident in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[1
2
3
4
RAICHUR: At least four persons including three students were killed and ten others injured when the vehicle they were travelling in overturned in the wee hours of Wednesday in this district, police said. The vehicle was carrying students of Mantralaya Sanskrit Pathashala were on a pilgrimage to Hampi to offer prayers at Narahari Temple. Police said the accident occurred near Araginamara Camp in Sindhanur.Deceased students have been identified as Aryavandan (18), Sucheendra (22) and A...]]>
item.author: Pti

item.title: Governor of Andhra Expresses Grief Over Death of 3 Students in Raichur Road Accident
item.description:
<![CDATA[Vijayawada: Governor of Andhra Pradesh S Abdul Nazeer has expressed anguish and profound grief on the death of three students of Veda Patashala of Mantralayam and the driver in a road accident near Sindhanur of Raichur district in Karnataka on Wednesday, said a statement.
The accident took place when the vehicle they were travelling in turned upside down.
Governor Abdul Nazeer offered his heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family members and directed the officials to provide better treatmen...]]>
